Dev Hawks

Precision, speed, and agility - that's the DevHawks way

  • Semester: 3rd

DevHawks, the team having diverse skill sets including knowledge of Backend, Frontend and Database as well as Data Science. We are inspired by the latest technologies to develop innovative and creative software solutions. With the advanced technologies available, we implement ideas and create exceptional software products. The DevHawks are committed to innovation and think outside the box to bring original and innovative ideas to every project. We keep up with technology's ever-evolving pace and utilize it to create agile software solutions that exceed expectations because that's the DevHawks way.

Binary Brains

Empowering your digital world with binary precision

  • Semester: 3rd

We, a team of four highly motivated students from Humber College, are eager to present our capstone project. Our objective is to provide innovative solutions to a real-world organization, utilizing our extensive knowledge and technical skills gained through the Information and Technology Solutions program. This project will offer us an opportunity to both apply our theoretical understanding and explore new technologies, as well as to challenge ourselves to deliver results within a specified timeframe. We are confident that our diverse backgrounds, creativity, and strong teamwork will enable us to make a valuable contribution to the organization and to the field of Information and Technology. We look forward to sharing our findings and results with you and are eager to engage in a meaningful dialogue about our project.

  • Semester: 3rd

QuadriSquad

Our team is highly motivated to add value to your company and contribute to your success. We are eager to bring our enthusiasm and dedication to your organization and collaborate to create innovative solutions.

SoftData Co.

"Building Intelligent and Adaptive Software with AI and Data Science"

  • Semester: 3rd

Meet our powerhouse team of SoftData Co.! Their expertise lies in transforming data into actionable insights/ patterns, building intelligent and adaptive systems, and revolutionizing the way businesses operate. Their collective skills and innovative approach bring a unique perspective to every project and are committed to delivering exceptional results.
